Verses: 2 neengal Ariyaadha Vere Dhevargalaip Pinbatri, Avargalaich Sevippom Vaarungal Endru Solli, Ungalukku Oru Adaiyaalaththaiyum Arpudhaththaiyum Kaanbippen Endru Kurippaaich Sonnaalum, Avan Sonna Adaiyaalamum Arpudhamum Nadandhaalum,

3 andhath Theerkkadharisiyaagilum, Andhach Soppanakkaaranaagilum Sollugiravaigalaik Kelaadhiruppeergalaaga; Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththaridaththil Neengal Ungal Muzhu Irudhayaththodum Ungal Muzhu Aaththumaavodum Anbukoorugireergalo Illaiyo Endru Ariyumbadikku Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalaich Sodhikkiraar.
4 neengal Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththaraip Pinbatri, Avarukkup Bayandhu, Avar Karpanaigalaik Kaikkondu, Avar Saththaththaik Kettu, Avaraich Seviththu, Avaraip Patrikkolveergalaaga.

5 andhath Theerkkadharisiyum, Andhach Soppanakkaaranum Kolaiseyyappadakkadavan; Neengal Nadakkumbadi Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththar Ungalukku Vidhiththa Vazhiyai Vittu Ungalai Vilakkumbadi, Avan, Ungalai Egipthudhesaththilirundhu Purappadappanninavarum Ungalai Adimaiththana Veettilirundhu Neengalaakki Meettukkondavarumaana Ungal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Virodhamaana Dhurogap Pechchaip Pesinaan; Ippadippatta Theemaiyai Ungalidaththilirundhu Vilakkuveergalaaga.

6 un Thaaikkup Pirandha Un Sagodharanaagilum, Un Kumaaranaagilum, Un Kumaaraththiyaagilum, Un Maarpilulla Un Manaiviyaagilum, Un Piraananaippolirukkira Un Sinegidhanaagilum Unnai Nokki: Naam Poi Vere Dhevargalaich Sevippom Vaarungal Endru Solli,

7 unnaich Sutrilum Unakkuch Sameebaththilaagilum Unakkuth Dhooraththilaagilum, Dhesaththin Orumunai Thodangi Marumunaimattumulla Evvidaththilaagilum Irukkira Janangaludaiya Dhevargalil, Neeyum Un Pidhaakkalum Ariyaadha Anniya Dhevargalaich Sevikkumbadi Ragasiyamaai Unnai Evivittaal,
8 nee Avanukkuch Sammadhiyaamalum, Avanukkuch Sevikodaamalum, Un Kan Avanmel Irakkangollaamalum, Avanaith Thappavidaamalum, Avanai Oliththu Vaikkaamalum,
9 avanaik Kolaiseydhupodavendum; Avanaik Kolaiseyvadharku, Mudhal Un Kaiyum Pinbu Sagala Janaththin Kaiyum Avanmel Irukkakkadavadhu.
10 adimaiththana Veedaagiya Egipthu Dhesaththilirundhu Unnaip Purappadappannina Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarai Vittu Vilagumbadi Avan Unnai Evinabadiyinaal, Avan Saagumbadi Avanmel Kalleriyakkadavaai.
11 isravelar Yaavarum Adhaik Kettup Bayandhu, Ini Un Naduve Ippadippatta Theemaiyaana Kaariyaththaich Seyyaadhiruppaargal.
12 un Dhevanaagiya Karththar Unakkuk Kudiyirukkumbadi Kodukkum Pattanangal Ondril Peliyaalin Makkalaagiya Dhushtamanidhar Unnidaththilirundhu Purappattu,
13 neengal Ariyaadha Vere Dhevargalaich Sevikkappovom Vaarungal Endru Thangal Pattanaththin Kudigalai Evinaargal Engira Seydhiyaik Kelvippadumbodhu,
14 nee Nandraai Visaariththu, Kettaaraaindhu, Appadippatta Aruvaruppaana Kaariyam Un Naduve Nadandhadhu Meyyum Nichchayamum Endru Kaanbaayaanaal,
15 andha Pattanaththin Kudigalaip Pattayakkarukkinaal Vetti, Adhaiyum Adhilulla Yaavatraiyum Adhin Miruga Jeevangalaiyum Pattayakkarukkinaal Sangaarampanni,

16 adhil Kollaiyittadhaiyellaam Adhin Naduveedhiyile Kootti, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarukku Endru Andhap Pattanaththaiyum, Adhil Kollaiyidappatta Yaavatraiyum Muzhuvadhum Akkiniyil Sutterikkakkadavaai; Adhu Inik Kattappadaamal, Niththiya Manmedaayirukkadavadhu.

17 sabikkappatta Porulil Ondrum Un Kaiyil Irukkavendaam. Naan Indru Unakkuk Karpikkira Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarin Karpanaigalaiyellaam Nee Kaikkondu, Un Dhevanaagiya Karththarudaiya Paarvaikkuch Semmaiyaanadhaich Seyyumbadi, Avar Saththaththirkuch Sevikoduppaayaanaal,
18 karththar Thamadhu Kobaththin Ukkiraththaivittuth Thirumbi, Unakkuth Dhayaiseydhu, Unakku Irangi, Avar Un Pidhaakkalukku Aanaiyittabadi Unnai Viruththiyadaiyappannuvaar.
